profile: Bonjour! Je m'appelle Adrianna. Je suis un ingénieur logiciel travaillant actuellement dans Stint

jobExperience.title: Stint
points: Developing new features for the mobile application (Android and iOS) in React Native, removing legacies from the codebase, updating and making changes to API (GraphQL and Python)

jobExperience.title: BBC News
points: Working closely with UX designers, researchers, product managers, testers and other engineers in implementing excellent user experience and finding way to make voters more engaged in elections

jobExperience.title: BBC Archive Services
points: Helping in building internal search engine

jobExperience.title: Edinburgh Napier University
jobExperience.job: Student Assistant for Data Analytics Module
points: Helping students to understand Data Analytics, including different approaches and algorithms

jobExperience.title: Computer Application Services
points: My summer project was developing  tracking tool focused on gathering user data regarding how users are using Workpro software in their everyday tasks. After gathering, the data is sent via web services to the database creating a new table. All the information in this table later is used for generating bar charts and Sankey diagrams on the website, in order to visualize the user's journey and usage of each feature per user.

jobExperience.title: University of Edinburgh
points: Helping users with using financial systems in the University of Edinburgh, often with the use of remote desktop control (Bomgar) or PL/SQL
Fixing and helping in managing database

education.final_project: Dissertation: Proof of Concept - Android Mobile Application for Customised Tourism

about_me.introduction: I am currently working as a full-stack Software Engineer for Stint in London. My hobbies includes:
hobbies: ⚛️ Programmer des projets parallèles dans Unity, React and Python 🐍
🇫🇷 Apprendre des langues (currently I am studying French) 🇫🇷
about_me.interests: My interests are focused on the impact of technology on people's everyday life and how technology can improve things.
about_me.ending: To find out more about me scroll down 😊
